## IAssignmentHooks.onPreAssignment() method

Invoked before a subject is assigned to an experiment variation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onPreAssignment(subject: string): Promise<string | null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subject | string | id of subject being assigned |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string \| null&gt;

variation to override for the given subject. If null is returned, then the subject will be assigned with the default assignment logic.
